    • getConnection

      public static Connection getConnection() throws ClassNotFoundException, SQLException
      Establishes a connection to the MySQL database.
      Returns:
      Connection object representing the database connection.
      Throws:
      ClassNotFoundException - If the database driver class is not found.
      SQLException - If an SQL exception occurs while establishing the connection.

    • insertDependent

      private static void insertDependent(Connection conn, String Essn, String Dependent_name, String Sex, String Bdate, String Relationship) throws SQLException
      Inserts a dependent record into the database.
      Parameters:
      conn - Connection object representing the database connection.
      Essn - Employee's Ssn.
      Dependent_name - Dependent name.
      Sex - Dependent Sex.
      Bdate - Dependent's Birth date.
      Relationship - Dependent's relationship with employee.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an SQL exception occurs during the insertion process.

    • deleteDependent

      private static void deleteDependent(Connection conn, String Essn, String Dependent_name) throws SQLException
      Deletes a dependent record from the database.
      Parameters:
      conn - Connection object representing the database connection.
      Essn - one of the 2 keys to identify one dependent.
      Dependent_name - one of the 2 keys to identify one dependent.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an SQL exception occurs during the deletion process.

    • insertProject

      private static void insertProject(Connection conn, String Pname, int Pnumber, String Plocation, int Dnum) throws SQLException
      Inserts a project record into the database.
      Parameters:
      conn - Connection object representing the database connection.
      Pname - name of the project.
      Pnumber - unique identifier of a project.
      Plocation - location of the project.
      Dnum - deparment number, foreign key.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an SQL exception occurs during the insertion process.

    • insertWorker

      private static void insertWorker(Connection conn, String Essn, int Pno, String Hours) throws SQLException
      Inserts a worker record into the database.
      Parameters:
      conn - Connection object representing the database connection.
      Essn - employee's Ssn.
      Pno - Project's number.
      Hours - Hours worked by employee.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an SQL exception occurs during the insertion process.

      conn - Connection object representing the database connection.
      Pnumber - The unique identifier of the Project.

      SQLException - If an SQL exception occurs during the deletion process.
